channel.title: Decipher 317 | 99% Uptime | Paid Dedi | Staff Apps Open |Great community|Great F
channel.description:
[B][CENTER][URL=http://"http://decipher-rsps.com/index/"][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/23rajjb.png[/img][/URL]
[url=http://decipher-rsps.com/index/]Decipher[/url]
[URL=http://"http://api.viglink.com/api/click?format=go&drKey=1082&loc=http%3A%2F%2Fdecipher-rsps.com%2Ftopic%2F8507095%2F1%2F&v=1&libid=1361475226470&out=http%3A%2F%2Fdl.dropbox.com%2Fu%2F54825351%2FV3Client.jar&ref=http%3A%2F%2Fdecipher-rsps.com%2Ftopic%2F8507095%2F2%2F&title=New%20Client%20Download%2021%2F02%2F2013&txt=http%3A%2F%2Fdl.dropbox.com%2Fu%2F54825351%2FV3Client.jar&jsonp=vglnk_jsonp_13614752448822"]Download[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://api.viglink.com/api/click?format=go&drKey=1082&loc=http%3A%2F%2Fdecipher-rsps.com%2Findex%2F&v=1&libid=1361482074070&out=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.decipher-rsps.info%2FWebclient%2FWebclient.html&ref=http%3A%2F%2Fdecipher-rsps.com%2Ftopic%2F8509737%2F2%2F&title=Decipher&txt=Play%20Now%20%5BWEBCLIENT%5D&jsonp=vglnk_jsonp_13614822391612"]Webclient[/URL]
Looking for staff and doing lots of drop parties all this week to celebrate server release. Private message a member of staff for your free 20m.
Decipher strives for quality, but also for the enjoyment of it's community. Decipher is a unique server, using an updated version of the Original Exium Source, for better gameplay.
Our developers work everyday to provide regular updates, aiming to produce the finest of new content for our community. As well as an experienced and dedicated staff team.
Features of Decipher
- A huge Pking community, with active Pking throughtout the server. As well as Active Clan Pking. - Lots of Unique Bosses with their own drop table! Including God Wars, Bork and many more. - Advanced Pk point system, with two Unique PKP shop with great rewards. - Barrows, Pest Control and the Duel Arena. All Working! - Double/Quadruple Experience Weekends. - Many different training areas, for our active Skilling Community. - Professional Staff Team. - Active community. - Professional ZetaBoards forums. - Vote4Reward and Donation Store on the Website. - Over 1600 Spawned NPC's. - Ability to reset Skills. - Torva, Virtus and Pernix. - Steadfast/Glacor/Ragefire Boots. - Tidy Home area with many shops to provide all of your item needs. - Vote shop with many un-common and sought out items. - Working Webclient. - 90% Working skills, soon to be 100%! -Donor island added, we have much more things to add for donor's still and that includes in the following:
More Items in the donor shop We will be adding a boss on the island We will be adding a Special attack restore altar A mining spot for fast XP A woodcutting spot for fast XP Other ways of getting skills fast Maybe its own barrows Custom shops, for donator benifits
Decipher has 4 dedicated developers working everyday to provide excellent new content for the community. We plan on adding complete skills including Dungeoneering with MULTIPLE floors.
We also have a Server Support Rank with Applications Avaliable on the forums.
Video of our a Recent Clan War which Occured on Decipher- [youtube] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bWtywQWlRWY&list=UUo_LQxhnPk3RVWTvW_FqUxA&index=3]Our Very Own - The Decipher War - YouTube[/url][/youtube]
Here's some media: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/14oa995.png[/img]

item.title: Decipher 317 | 99% Uptime | Paid Dedi | Staff Apps Open |Great community|Great F
item.dc:creator: @tommy17890 tommy17890
item.description:
@tommy17890 wrote:

[B][CENTER]

Decipher

Download

Webclient

Looking for staff and doing lots of drop parties all this week to celebrate server release.
Private message a member of staff for your free 20m.

Decipher strives for quality, but also for the enjoyment of it’s community. Decipher is a unique server, using an updated version of the Original Exium Source, for better gameplay.

Our developers work everyday to provide regular updates, aiming to produce the finest of new content for our community. As well as an experienced and dedicated staff team.

Features of Decipher

  • A huge Pking community, with active Pking throughtout the server. As well as Active Clan Pking.
  • Lots of Unique Bosses with their own drop table! Including God Wars, Bork and many more.
  • Advanced Pk point system, with two Unique PKP shop with great rewards.
  • Barrows, Pest Control and the Duel Arena. All Working!
  • Double/Quadruple Experience Weekends.
  • Many different training areas, for our active Skilling Community.
  • Professional Staff Team.
  • Active community.
  • Professional ZetaBoards forums.
  • Vote4Reward and Donation Store on the Website.
  • Over 1600 Spawned NPC’s.
  • Ability to reset Skills.
  • Torva, Virtus and Pernix.
  • Steadfast/Glacor/Ragefire Boots.
  • Tidy Home area with many shops to provide all of your item needs.
  • Vote shop with many un-common and sought out items.
  • Working Webclient.
  • 90% Working skills, soon to be 100%!
    -Donor island added, we have much more things to add for donor’s still and that includes in the following:

More Items in the donor shop
We will be adding a boss on the island
We will be adding a Special attack restore altar
A mining spot for fast XP
A woodcutting spot for fast XP
Other ways of getting skills fast
Maybe its own barrows
Custom shops, for donator benifits

Decipher has 4 dedicated developers working everyday to provide excellent new content for the community. We plan on adding complete skills including Dungeoneering with MULTIPLE floors.

We also have a Server Support Rank with Applications Avaliable on the forums.

Video of our a Recent Clan War which Occured on Decipher-
[youtube] Our Very Own - The Decipher War - YouTube[/youtube]
